function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low-performing technical domains in the three case study buildings","Impact":"Decreased building performance and potential for transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing extensive reporting and fault detection systems, increasing sub-metering","Technologies":"Reporting systems, fault detection platforms","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Technical managers"},{"Description":"Implementation of system capabilities and units in the near future","Impact":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases if systems are not properly managed","Mitigation":"Ensuring proper installation and management of new systems","Technologies":"System capabilities and management units","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Technical managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and cooling systems","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and decreased indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Upgrading ventilation and cooling systems, implementing fault detection and diagnostics","Technologies":"Upgraded ventilation and cooling systems, fault detection platforms","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Technical managers"}]}
